mainText: Mr. Jobs, thank you for all the great inventions. My generation has grown up with portable mp3 players (iPod), iTunes, touchscreen cell phones (iPhones), watching CGI animated movies like Toy Story, tablets (iPad) and most importantly having a personal computer at home. You were an imaginative innovator and at the same time one of the greatest business minds of our times. I'm 24 and you changed the way we all live life. The Edison, the Ford of our times. R.I.P.
author: Andrew
